question: What is Specific Gravity of bitumen?

answers.a: Ratio of mass of given volume of substance to equal volume of water
answers.b: Ratio of mass of given volume of substance to equal volume of mass
answers.c: Ratio of mass of given water of substance to equal volume of substance
answers.d: Ratio all over mass to water
